articles.author: Vlad
articles.title: Redmi Watch 2 Lite lands in Europe, yours for just €69.99 - GSMArena.com news - GSMArena.com
articles.description: It's an entry-level model, sure, but it looks pretty good.
articles.content: Xiaomi's sub-brand Redmi announced its Watch 2 Lite back in November, and now the wearable is finally available to buy in Europe, from the official Mi store. It's not out in all countries yet, though… [+1050 chars]

articles.author: Derrick Penner
articles.title: COVID-19: Omicron could spike infections to highest numbers B.C. has seen - Vancouver Sun
articles.description: B.C. has few cases of COVID's Omicron variant now, but the experience in the U.K and Europe shows the new strain could soon dominate here.
articles.content:
The unwelcome arrival of the variant means a pandemic-weary public needs to follow precautions as they get together for holiday gatherings. 
Derrick Penner
People queue to get a coronavirus booster… [+8161 chars]

articles.author: Alex Alderson
articles.title: Xiaomi Watch S1 to launch within the next few months, launches scheduled in Europe and Asia Pacific countries - Notebookcheck.net
articles.description: Reportedly, Xiaomi has settled on releasing the Watch S1 before April 2022. The smartwatch does away with Xiaomi's 'Mi' branding and will be available across Europe and Asia Pacific countries.
articles.content: Last month, @stufflistings and Digital Chat Station revealed that Xiaomi had certified the Watch S, a new brand for the company. Now, 91mobiles and the same leaker state that Xiaomi is preparing to r… [+992 chars]
